00044 int main(int ac, char *av[]) {
00045    
00046         clock_t startt,endt;
00047         cout << "Loading tables..." << endl;
00048    
00049         try {
00050                 ParamReader Reader(ac, av);
00051                         
00052                 Simulation Simul(Reader.GetNetworkFile(), Reader.GetWeightsFile(), Reader.GetSimulationTime(), Reader.GetSimulationStepTime());
00053                 for (unsigned int i=0; i<Reader.GetInputSpikeDrivers().size(); ++i){
00054                         Simul.AddInputSpikeDriver(Reader.GetInputSpikeDrivers()[i]);
00055                 }
00056                         
00057                 for (unsigned int i=0; i<Reader.GetOutputSpikeDrivers().size(); ++i){
00058                         Simul.AddOutputSpikeDriver(Reader.GetOutputSpikeDrivers()[i]);
00059                 }
00060                 
00061                 for (unsigned int i=0; i<Reader.GetMonitorDrivers().size(); ++i){
00062                         Simul.AddMonitorActivityDriver(Reader.GetMonitorDrivers()[i]);
00063                 }
00064                 
00065                 for (unsigned int i=0; i<Reader.GetOutputWeightDrivers().size(); ++i){
00066                         Simul.AddOutputWeightDriver(Reader.GetOutputWeightDrivers()[i]);
00067                 }
00068                 Simul.SetSaveStep(Reader.GetSaveWeightStepTime());
00069                                         
00070                 if(Reader.CheckInfo()){
00071                         //Simul.GetNetwork()->tables_info();
00072                         //neutypes_info();
00073                         Simul.GetNetwork()->GetNetInfo(cout);
00074                 }
00075                         
00076                 cout << "Simulating network..." << endl;
00077                 
00078                 startt=clock();
00079                 Simul.RunSimulation();
00080                 endt=clock();
00081          
00082                 cout << "Oky doky" << endl;     
00083 
00084                 cout << "Elapsed time: " << (endt-startt)/(float)CLOCKS_PER_SEC << " sec" << endl;
00085                 cout << "Number of updates: " << Simul.GetSimulationUpdates() << endl;
00086                 cout << "Mean number of spikes in heap: " << Simul.GetHeapAcumSize()/(float)Simul.GetSimulationUpdates() << endl;
00087                 cout << "Updates per second: " << Simul.GetSimulationUpdates()/((endt-startt)/(float)CLOCKS_PER_SEC) << endl;
00088         } catch (ParameterException Exc){
00089                 cerr << Exc << endl;
00090                 cerr << av[0] << " -time Simulation_Time -nf Network_File -wf Weights_File";
00091                 cerr << " [-info] [-sf Final_Weights_File] [-wt Save_Weight_Step] [-st Simulation_Step_Time] [-log Activity_Register_File] [-if Input_File] ";
00092                 cerr << "[-ic IPAddress:Port Server|Client] [-of Output_File] [-oc IPAddress:Port Server|Client] [-ioc IPAddress:Port Server|Client]" << endl;  
00093         } catch (ConnectionException Exc){
00094                 cerr << Exc << endl;
00095                 return 1;
00096         } catch (EDLUTFileException Exc){
00097                 cerr << Exc << endl;
00098                 return Exc.GetErrorNum();
00099         } catch (EDLUTException Exc){
00100                 cerr << Exc << endl;
00101                 return Exc.GetErrorNum();
00102         }
00103         return 0;
00104 }
